Function instance_path_icon

Source 
pub fn instance_path_icon(
    timeline: &TimelineName,
    db: &EntityDb,
    instance_path: &InstancePath,
) -> &'static Icon
Expand description

Return the instance path icon.

The choice of icon is based on whether the instance is “empty” as in hasn’t any logged component on the current timeline.
